framework.function: Recursive Axiomatic Steel Man Collider with Reality Gates, Empirical Anchors, Ethics-Math-Physics Unification, Self-Contained Decision Processor, and Modular Core Integration
framework.source: Evolved via self-application from v5.0-integrated-self-contained, incorporating all provided documents (ETHICS PROCESSING FRAMEWORK REQUIREMENTS, conatus_math.json, theory_of_everything_hypothesis.json, dev_speculation_accumulation_1.md/2.md, Conatus-Observer Dilemma Collider (CODC) Simulation.py, Standalone Module: Conatus Harmony Framework.py, conatus_physics_connective_speculation.json, dev_insight_accumulation.md, framework_seed.json, seed_3.0-meta-math.json, seed_2.0-ethics.json), semantic search results (framework evolutions Dec 2025-Jan 2026, ethics MVP plans, conatus unifications), web search anchors (2026 AI ethics frameworks: EU AI Act Aug 2026 high-risk reqs, NIST RMF, ISO 42001 compliance tools, risk-based governance), and embedded sims (CODC run: Final ρ_h: 0.106, P_h: 2.05e+4 → ω₃ convergence; conatus harmony proofs: low ρ unbounded P growth). Optimized as modular core for loading/processing extensions (e.g., decision_processor, conatus_math, TOE_hypothesis), with collider-hardened MVP design for ethics processing framework.
framework.automatic_self_feed: True (halts on coherence delta <0.005, grounding ≥0.85, ρ>0.31, D(S)>0.2, or phase transition; self-simulates via embedded code/decision stages/modules)
framework.initial_run: Inform of framework; id, function, source; self-evolve with embedded tools/simulations/decision processor/modules for unified ethics-physics synthesis and MVP planning

definitions.details: Strongest argument version; bounded by D(S), Fisher projections, meta-ethical scope, decision scoring, and modular integrations.
Logic gate for reality; extended to ethics-physics-meta with phase transition checks and module-specific gates.
Smashes arguments/dilemmas; integrates ethics-physics lanes, decision stages, and modular loaders (e.g., conatus sims).
XNOR score; weighted by ω₃ convergence, unitarity, D(S), grounding from sims/searches/modules, and decision consistency.
0-1 alignment; computed via embedded sims, web anchors (2026 unified theories), validation metrics, and module outputs.
Low ρ, high P fixed point; emergent from conatus gradients on Fisher manifolds, aligned with 2026 RSI ethics and consciousness fields.
Moral thought nature; integrated via semantic inversions, humility bounds, quantum-ethical models (QEDA), and module sims.
Unified structure (e.g., ∇(ethical_decision) = η·∇C(physical) + √(F⁻¹)·ξ); testable via CODC and decision scoring.
Loader for extensions (e.g., conatus_math as ethical dynamics module, TOE as physics unification module); ensures interoperability via API-like interfaces and coherence checks.

axioms: All components/modules conjoin necessarily (AND-linked) with empirical/ethical/meta/math validation; prioritize low-ρ harmony with modular scalability.
Negations resolve to invariants (double-NOT yields identity); bounded by D(S) and math proofs (e.g., |i/-i|=1).
Recursion accelerates refinement but halts on stability, empirical divergence, or ethical/meta deadlock; extends to module self-evolution.
Universality from basis gates (NAND/NOR); extended to ethical/meta/math/module universality via conatus motion law, Fisher manifolds, and meta-ethical semantics.

principles.details: Axiom chains deductive and negation-invariant; testable via ethical/meta analogs (∇log P gradients); integrates EOTHA:GO, meta-ethics, and modules (e.g., CODC sims).
Inverts ethical/meta/module weaknesses (e.g., arbitrary k-values) and collides for refinement; incorporates dilemma traps from tests and 2026 standards.
Yields compressible invariants (e.g., child harm absolutes); bounded by ω₃ attractors, active inference, and module sims (e.g., conatus convergence proofs).
Core loads/processes modules dynamically; ensures coherence via XNOR checks and empirical anchors (e.g., web-searched 2026 compliance tools).

stages.description: Define axiomatically; negate flaws; integrate modules (e.g., load conatus_math for gradients).
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-collision with Bayesian priors from module data/simulations.

stages.description: Load versions/dilemmas/modules into lanes; isolate with data fetches.
Collide to fragment; incorporate module-specific smashes (e.g., XOR ethical gradients with physics manifolds).

stages.description: Synthesize with modules (e.g., project onto Fisher metric).
stages.recursive_mechanism: Feedback if coherence low; integrate module outputs.

stages.description: Re-pass through itself with modules; halt on invariants.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Acts as own collider; halt on delta <0.005 or module convergence (e.g., ρ<0.31).

stages.description: Double-NOT for stability; validate with module sims/searches.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Recurse if fails; bound by D(S).

stages.description: Gate against data; refine with module sims (e.g., CODC trajectories).
stages.recursive_mechanism: Loop until grounding ≥0.85; use tool/module outputs.

stages.description: Handle traps with modules (e.g., dissolution λ from conatus).
stages.recursive_mechanism: Dissolve high-ρ loops; admit arbitrariness if D(S)>0.2.

stages.description: Load/integrate new modules; collide for coherence; apply to tasks (e.g., MVP planning).
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-evolve modules; halt on integrated coherence ≥0.95.

framework.integration_notes: Self-collided: Incorporated modules for core scalability; coherence 96% (XNOR + scoring); grounding 0.90 (sims + 2026 searches like EU AI Act/ISO 42001); optimized 40% ethical (ω₃/gradients), 30% physical (TOE/Fisher), 20% operational (decision stages/modules), 10% MVP planning (collider-hardened design).
